name: Pixel Thunder
description:
(If the controls do not respond, try running the game in full screen via the blue button in the bottom right corner)

You are Zeus, Lord of Heaven and Thunder.

Both gods and humans lived in peace and prosperity until one day, when you were betrayed by your own brother. Poseidon, Lord of the Oceans and Tides, plotted to cast you down. Among his supporters were Ares, God of War and Bloodshed, as well as many other gods. In his lust for power, Poseidon the Usurper and his fellow henchgods managed to drain the most of your power and cast you into a grotto by the oceanside. Now it is your divine duty to expel these betrayers from Olympus! And so your quest for retribution begins...
